entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Sydenham

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 9:10 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:10 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
